div.div:
Jim - June 13, 2012 - HTC EVO 3D with version 2.0.8
Awesom
Full featured and a developer that stays on top of things with timely updates. If you have direction problems calibrate your phone's compass instead of blaming the app.

Michael - July 3, 2012 - Version 2.0.8
Not bad but could be much better
Minimal celestial depiction and nomenclature. ISS pass data never seems to show up in the sightings log. I go to the NASA GSFC website for their satellite pass data which is detailed and accurate. Space Junk Pro should be a free app due to its deficiencies. Having said that it's still OK for the enthusiast. FYI: The Google Star Map is more detailed.

Ry - June 20, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 2.0.8
Fix it
SGS 3 still not displaying correctly

Guy - June 9, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 2.0.8
Needs,work
Needs further refinement, more features to aide the user.

C.Ward - June 6, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 2.0.7
Great app. Saw hubble i think....
pulled out my sensation and sure enough it was hubble. and it works great on landscape mode too! i jus need to fully explore more apps that will show the azimuth and inclination as well..1 with a learning tool. Great app, well worth the money. Space junk lite is a great starter app ! jus saw a SL-16R/B float over my head..

cameron - April 22, 2012 - HTC One S with version 2.0.7
Great Stuff!
I initially had a problem with this on my HTC One S, but an update was released very quickly and it now works great. Very cool app and very responsive developer. Fantastic stuff! - Check it out!

jeffonbass - April 25, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 2.0.7
Highly recommended
This is a great app. Better than the Google Sky Map and the satellite info is fascinating. Developer was really helpful when I had a problem too. Works perfectly on my HTC Sensation XE running ICS

Jim - May 16, 2012 - Droid Bionic with version 2.0.7
Captain Jim
Best one yet at 42,000 feet!

Aimee - April 24, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 2.0.7
Very entertaining
Love the sat finder

we6jbo - May 21, 2012 - HTC Nexus One with version 2.0.7
The night sky
All purpose astronomy

Peter - April 19, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF101 with version 2.0.6
Working great again...
Thanks for the update.....a. great app....in my top 5 fav's.

David - April 18, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.0.6
App Works Great Again
Freaking awesome app again! Latest update fixed previous updates' problems! With the some of the updates there's been a few glitches, but Support has always been excellent, with fast responses.

ridgerider - April 17, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 2.0.6
Last update killed the app on my Droid X
EVERY time I try to open app, if shows a force close screen. NOT GOOD! Espically since I paid for this!!!!

Tim - April 19, 2012 - Samsung Infuse 4G with version 2.0.6
Love this app
Very unhappy now. It will not execute ... Stops at textures. Samsung

Brian - April 17, 2012 - Galaxy Player with version 2.0.5
Change for changes sake
Will only point east, dark side of earth is light???. Please fix and leave it alone. How do you load previous version?

Peter - April 17, 2012 - HTC Desire with version 2.0.4
Space junk Pro
Latest update doesn't load on my HTC Desire reverting to previous version

jrk654 - April 17, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 2.0.4
Ok
Work,s

Brian - April 17, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 2.0.4
HTC inspire
Does not run after update. 4/17

Vulcelt - April 17, 2012 - Motorola Atrix with version 2.0.4
Junk indeed
Will not work after update!

Alan - April 12, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.0.3
Excellent
I love this because not only can you track the stars and constellations but also satellites and the space station etc. in REAL TIME.

Randy - April 7, 2012 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 2.0.3
Fixed!
Great app again now that it's fixed.

Jacob - April 8, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 2.0.3
Rate
Awesome app

ircphoenix - April 1, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 2.0.2
Excellent app for space junkies.
I started with the lite app which did everything I needed it to do but decided since I use it so much, I'd kick down the 5 bucks for pro. Note to dev : if you lower the price to 2 bucks you'll probably encourage 3 or 4 times the purchases.

P.D. - April 2, 2012 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 2.0.2
Houston, everything is "A-OK" !
Thanks for all the work in correcting a bad app update. Wish I could give ten times as many stars. I have never dealt a better customer service!

Lee - April 6, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 2.0.2
Help
I have just upgraded my Android software to the latest version. This app won't work , any fixes out there ?

john - April 6, 2012 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 2.0.2
Awesome
Great app just for star gazing. Tried lite and went pro in 20 min. Support was excellent, solved my issue within 8 hrs. Get this!

Steve - April 1, 2012 - HTC myTouch 4G with version 2.0.2
VERSION 2.0.2 Working again
Thanks for fixing issues in version 2.0!!!!!!! Now it's a 5 star app again :-)

kenneth - April 2, 2012 - Version 2.0.2
Cool app w/great support
So glad its working fine now-- wish other app administrators were as responsive. Absolutely deserves top rating.

B - March 31, 2012 - HTC Sensation XL with version 1.9.6
Was good now waste of money
Last update killed the app and made it useless. Sort it now or I'm coming for a refund as its totally useless now.

. - October 28, 2011 - Version 1.9.6
.
SEXY & HAWT! WELL WORTH UPGRADING FROM space junk LITE to PRO! "very useful in my space travels" - ADMIRAL JAMES T. KIRK.

Brandie - February 15, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.9.6
Disappointed after updates
Have tried many troubleshoots and no luck. Worked great when I first installed abt 6 mo ago, but doesn't orient correctly since last couple of updates. Really liked it before that. Epic 4G and Galaxy Tab

Roger - September 24, 2011 - HTC myTouch 4G with version 1.9.6
Awesome App. Viewing/tracking UARS SATELLITE as I type this! Buy this App, it is ...
Awesome App. Viewing/tracking UARS SATELLITE as I type this! Buy this App, it is amazing :-)

mark - October 23, 2010 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.9.6
I've purchased every tracking app in the market. Star3 is the clear winner. The ...
I've purchased every tracking app in the market. Star3 is the clear winner. The best GUI, dead on positioning, tracks EVERYTHING. Worth every $. Moto1

dashraptor - June 4, 2011 - Acer Picasso with version 1.9.6
Best Sat Tracker For Android
Star3map worked so well (went outside and found a satellite moments after install) on my Acer TAB A500, I bought the App immediately. The Google Sky Map, Geocaching App, and others just refuse to point in the right direction. So I was pretty sure the TAB was bad from the factory, and your App saved me from returning the thing!

EdwardG - September 28, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 1.9.6
Great!
A great way to learn to appreciate the night sky. The developer is very helpful and quick to respond!

eden - March 27, 2012 - Dell Streak with version 1.9.6
Wnt to give it more...
...as it looks great and has nice functions. Unfortunately it doesn't read the accelerometer on my Dell Streak Mini 5 properly (froyo).

Jim - February 26, 2012 - Casio G'zOne Commando with version 1.9.6
Excellent
Does exactly what it says. Well worth the money!

Nickname unavailable - March 30, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.9.6
Orientation is poor. Needs calibration feature
After problems with force closing on start up it now works but find its orientation is poor. When i point south it shows east etc. Have tried figure of eight thing and it doesn't work to calibrated. All other apps i have are excellent when calibrated from within the app. Samsung galaxy s 2

Arc - July 19, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 1.9.6
A nice app. Ideal for satellite spotting. Good UI, nice idea that you can ...
A nice app. Ideal for satellite spotting. Good UI, nice idea that you can log observations to Facebook. Thank you and well done. Desire 2.2

randy - May 10, 2011 - Version 1.9.6
Great App from a Nice Developer
I had problems downloading this app and it was an Android Market problem, but the developer responded immediately and was very helpful. The app does everything I need it to do.

October 1, 2011 - Version 1.9.6
Have to admit I was skeptical but
this app is impressive. Nice job devs, this really works. Will be looking forward to any updates.

David - December 20, 2011 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 1.9.6
Nice app, but....
Seems to really suck the battery down...phone is warm.

October 22, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.9.6
...
That's no UFO....It's the Space Station! Great app! Where's ROSAT?

Thomas - March 13, 2012 - Galaxy S2 Skyrocket with version 1.9.6
Failure
Not good the names and lines of the constellations fade too quickly to be able to find them in the sky

tera - September 21, 2011 - Droid Bionic with version 1.9.6
Very cool.
I appreciate the different layers. Good job!

Mike - July 14, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.9.6
Smoother and better looking than Google skymap. Great satellite display. My ...
Smoother and better looking than Google skymap. Great satellite display. My favourite app.

Bud - July 25, 2011 - Motorola Atrix with version 1.9.6
Very nice........
Amazes my friends. Forces me to have to BEG for my fone back!

Philip - December 29, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 1.9.6
Nice enough app though Satellite AR is better at the job and free.

Steve - March 17, 2012 - Motorola Atrix with version 1.9.6
Nice app!
Work great on my Atrix 4g.

John - March 23, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.9.6
Love it
Great price for a powerful tool!!!

A - September 8, 2010 - Version 1.9.6
Great ap worked perfect for a few days then got a bug and shut ...
Great ap worked perfect for a few days then got a bug and shut down after a few mins and when it does come on get blocks in place of names

Angie - May 7, 2012 - Huawei M860 with version 1.9.6
Perfect!!!

Eric - September 23, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.9.6
Great

Little Ace - August 16, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.9.3
Great for kids
Love this app my son an I spend a lot of time using it...

lavan - August 26, 2011 - LG Optimus One with version 1.9.3
Star3Map
I love it! It's great! Try it see what's in your skies above!

Steve - May 14, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.9.1
Awsome app i def recommend it works great on my new galaxy indulge btw ...
Awsome app i def recommend it works great on my new galaxy indulge btw is an awsome phone go get or try it ne way

tom - July 26, 2011 - Motorola Motoroi with version 1.9.1
Day or night. Works perfectly. Not one probably in 9mo. Since. Install

Nicole - May 30, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.9.1
I've had app 4 over a month now & everything the dev says is ...
I've had app 4 over a month now & everything the dev says is true! My life IS better! I love to stargaze. No crashing, freezing. Samsung Galaxy S 2.2

brian - June 6, 2011 - Motorola Atrix with version 1.9.1
How entertaing is this my grandson josh loves it

vinnie - May 10, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.9.1
WOW works great on desire

Trevor - June 27, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.9.1
On nexus s the orientation is inaccurate not as good as Google sky that ...
On nexus s the orientation is inaccurate not as good as Google sky that came free

wes - June 8, 2011 - Version 1.9.1
Best app I have ever purchased. Great for porch sittin in the eve.

Greg - March 28, 2011 - Motorola XOOM with version 1.9.1
Would be better if greater zoom allowed better viewing of high orbiting sattelites ...
Would be better if greater zoom allowed better viewing of high orbiting sattelites like GPS.

Nick - May 10, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.9.1
Problems getting it working on my phone but the developers support was really ...
Problems getting it working on my phone but the developers support was really impressive.

R - June 11, 2011 - LG Swift with version 1.9.1
Wouldn't open properly. Uninstalled

John - March 28, 2011 - Version 1.9.0
Good app. I like the simple interface where the object of attention is named ...
Good app. I like the simple interface where the object of attention is named but there is no other clutter. Touching an object brings up the details.

WIlliam Manganaro - March 21, 2011 - HTC Aria with version 1.9.0
Its very small & hard to see. Google sky much better. & I tried ...
Its very small & hard to see. Google sky much better. & I tried to get my money back right away & no option for that. Not recommended & I got robbed

Andy - March 26, 2011 - Version 1.9.0
App2SD implemented = Excellent!

e.eq.m*c**2 - March 6, 2011 - Version 1.8.8
I am definitely a better person for owning this app. Well, sort of. The ...
I am definitely a better person for owning this app. Well, sort of. The interface on this is much better than google sky imho.

James - March 6, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.8.8
Good to use with Heavens Above and Google Sky. It showed me the space ...
Good to use with Heavens Above and Google Sky. It showed me the space shuttle and docking with ISS. It's weakness is distance of satellites.

John - February 27, 2011 - Motorola Droid with version 1.8.8
Awesome app! Looking for pass predictions. This is better than cheese!

W. John - March 1, 2011 - Motorola Droid X2 with version 1.8.8
Bummer. Recent update now hangs and crashes my droid1.

Stephan - February 18, 2011 - Galaxy Player with version 1.8.4
Very nice well-made app. Great for anyone interested in checking out the night sky ...
Very nice well-made app. Great for anyone interested in checking out the night sky and recognizing stars, planets and man made satellites etc. ******

Peter - February 15, 2011 - Version 1.8.3
Dev quick, freeze fixed, offered refund past Market deadline. Prog promising but ...
Dev quick, freeze fixed, offered refund past Market deadline. Prog promising but needs work

Simon - February 18, 2011 - Version 1.8.3
Great app, probably best for figuring out satellites and foreign bodies. Dev great ...
Great app, probably best for figuring out satellites and foreign bodies. Dev great response to email on magnetic declination, hopefully fix coming!

JKOakes - February 18, 2011 - HTC myTouch 4G with version 1.8.3
Beautiful app - best satelite app out there. Simple to use. Runs perfectly. When ...
Beautiful app - best satelite app out there. Simple to use. Runs perfectly. When I had questions Cass responded immediately to insure it was working.

Vantiveman - February 14, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.8.3
The hanging problem is fixed now. I mailed the Dev and a fix was ...
The hanging problem is fixed now. I mailed the Dev and a fix was soom uploaded. A very friendly and responsive Dev, if you have a problem send a mail

Richard - February 28, 2011 - HTC myTouch 3G with version 1.8.3
Great app, the developer is fantastic. Responds immediately if needed. Buy it!

Frank - June 2, 2011 - Version 1.8.2
Good app!

Nik - February 1, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.8.0

Steven - January 13, 2011 - Version 1.8.0
Works great on DroidX!

Adam - February 2, 2011 - HTC Wildfire with version 1.8.0

Very good app. Great for the kids! And I found my wifes star with it! Awesome

Eric - December 16, 2010 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 1.7.7
Needs the ability to select individual satellites, not just groups.

Jonathan - September 7, 2010 - Version 1.6.5
Force close ever 1 minute on droid x with 2.2 update and all all ...
